pages.text: ‘E'ito sthira niscita ye, ma'i allaha sambandhe satyara bahirae eko naka'om. Tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa spasta nidarsana lai ma'i tomalokara ocarata ahicho, seye bani icharaa'ilaka tumi mora lagata yabalai diya’
Si (phira'a'une) ka’le, ‘yadi tumi kono nidarsana lai ahicha, tente seya peca karaa yadi tumi satyabadi’
Tetiya mucha'i nijara hatara lakhutidala niksepa karaile arau lage lage seya edala ajagara sapata parainata ha’la
Arau te'om nijara hata bahiralai uliya'i anile arau lage lage seya darsakara ocarata subhra ujjbala drstipata ha’la
Phira'a'una sampradayara netasakale ka’le, ‘niscaya e'om ejana sudaksa yadukara’
‘e'om tomalokaka nija desara paraa bahiskara karaiba bicarae, etiya tomaloke ki paraamarsa diya’
sihamte ka’le, ‘te'omka arau te'omra bhatrka alapa arakasa diyaka, arau caharae-nagarae sangraahakasakalaka patha'i diyaka’
‘yate sihamte aponara ocarata pratijana sudaksa yadukaraka upasthita karae’
Yadukarasakale phira'a'unara ocarata ahi ka’le, ‘ami yadi bijayi ha'om tente amara babe puraskara thakiba ne na'i’
si ka’le, ‘haya, niscaya tomaloka mora ghanistasakalara antarbhukta ha’ba’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘he mucha! Tumi (agate) niksepa karaiba ne ami (agate) niksepa karaima’
te'om (mucha'i) ka’le, ‘tomaloke'i niksepa karaa’. Yetiya sihamte niksepa karaile, tetiya sihamte manuhara cakuta yadu karaile, sihamtaka atankita karaile arau eta danara yadu pradarsana karaile
Arau ami muchara prati ahi karailo ye, ‘tumi tomara lakhutidala niksepa karaa’. Lage lage se'itorae sihamte yi alika bastu bana'ichila se'iboraka gili pelabalai dharaile
phalata satya pratisthita ha’la arau sihamte yi karaichila seya batila hai ga’la
Eteke sihamte tata paraajita ha’la arau lanchita hai ubhati ga’la
